oai_dc:dc.dc:title: On the Pringsheim convergence of double series
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: LIMAYE, BV
ZELTSER, M
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: summability theory
double series
convergence test
pringsheim convergence
boundedly convergent
regularly convergent
cauchy product
matrix transformation
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Several aspects of the convergence of a double series in the sense of Pringsheim are considered in analogy with some well-known results for single series. They include various tests for absolute convergence and also criteria for convergence of the Cauchy product. Some errors in the works of earlier authors are corrected.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: PROCEEDINGS OF THE ESTONIAN ACADEMY OF SCIENCES, 58(2), 108-121
